articles.title: Slime away grime, dust and crumbs with this cleaning gel, down to $6 (50% off!)
articles.author: Yahoo Life Shopping Editors
articles.summary: ColorCoral introduces its Universal Cleaning Gel, a lemon-scented product designed for cleaning hard-to-reach areas in electronics, appliances, and car interiors. The reusable cleaning gel is currently on sale for $6 and has garnered positive reviews from users for its effectiveness in removing dust and debris.

articles.title: Slime away grime, dust and crumbs with this cleaning gel — it's $6 (50% off)
articles.author: Izabella Zaydenberg
articles.summary: ColorCoral introduced Universal Cleaning Gel, a lemon-scented product designed for cleaning electronics, appliances, and car interiors. The cleaning gel is reusable and removes dust and debris from hard-to-reach areas like keyboards and car vents. It is available for purchase and has received positive reviews from users.

articles.title: 2025's All About Reinvention: vivo Y19s keeps you charged for your big goals
articles.author: BMPlus
articles.summary: vivo is launching the vivo Y19s smartphone in the Philippines, featuring a 5500mAh battery with 15W FlashCharge, a 50MP main camera, and a 5MP front camera. The vivo Y19s is available at the vivo e-store, Shopee, Lazada, and physical stores nationwide for Php 6,499.

articles.title: GETTIN' DIRTY: New Braunfels' 1st Swig serving up customizable sodas, snacks ahead of grand opening
articles.author: Kaitlynn Hutchins
articles.summary: Swig, a TikTok-famous soda shop, has opened a new location in New Braunfels with a soft opening. A grand opening event is scheduled to begin on January 16. The New Braunfels location is already performing well, according to store manager Ella Reynolds.

articles.title: マスク氏のxAI、スタンドアロン型「Grok」アプリ発表
articles.author: Alexa Corse
articles.summary: xAI, Elon Musk's AI startup, has launched its first stand-alone consumer app called "Grok," which is also the name of the AI language model developed by xAI. The Grok app is available on Apple's App Store as a beta version and provides access to xAI's latest model, Grok 2, for free.

articles.title: TD Africa Launches Green Hero Initiative for Sustainable Future
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: TD Africa launched the Green Hero Initiative. The initiative tackles Nigeria's energy challenges. The initiative promotes the adoption of sustainable practices.

articles.title: Nvidia Hands-Down Won AI at CES 2025, And Also the Show Itself. Here's Why That Matters
articles.author: Imad Khan
articles.summary: Nvidia unveiled its Cosmos AI model at CES 2025, designed to help robots and autonomous vehicles understand the physical world.  The company also announced the Thor chip for cars and trucks, aimed at Level 4 autonomous driving, along with the 50-series lineup of gaming and laptop GPUs, promising enhanced performance and AI-driven rendering.

articles.title: Henkel's Smartwash™ Defines a New Era of Clean at CES® 2025  Jan. 9, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: Henkel has launched its Smartwash™ Technology, an AI-driven detergent dosing system for washing machines and dishwashers, alongside Persil® and Somat® Smartwash, targeting the European market in 2025. Smartwash dispenses the right amount of detergent during wash cycles and solves consumer issues related to detergent usage.

articles.title: Adorable owl-shaped AI guardian robot can be your child's best friend
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: TCL introduced Ai Me, the world's first modular AI companion robot, at CES 2025 in Las Vegas. Ai Me, designed as a family helper, can watch over kids and monitor homes with expressive digital eyes and a lively voice.

articles.title: J&R Seafood Market Opening Off The Hook Restaurant In Mystic
articles.author: Chris Spiker
articles.summary: J&R is launching 'Off The Hook,' a grab-and-go concept offering fresh seafood. This new service aims to provide a convenient seafood option for locals and visitors in Mystic.

articles.title: Two global brands propose holistic AI integration into daily life at CES 2025
articles.author: Leigh Harrington
articles.summary: LG plans to seamlessly integrate AI into daily life with 'affectionate AI', envisioning a zero-labor home. Samsung's vision for 2025 involves 'Home AI', using AI automation to integrate and customize user experiences with smart devices and virtual assistant Bixby.

articles.title: Young Living Redefines Innovation with the Launch of Wyld Notes
articles.summary: Young Living launched Wyld Notes, a sister company. Wyld Notes complements and enhances Young Living's Network Marketing model. This launch reinforces Young Living's dedication to the direct selling industry.

articles.title: Ecovacs shows off powerful Deebot X8 Pro Omni robot vacuum at CES 2025
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Ecovacs is introducing the Deebot X8 Pro Omni, which utilizes a new technology.

articles.title: Amazon now sells new Hyundai vehicles in 48 U.S. cities
articles.author: Lou Ruggieri
articles.summary: Amazon has launched 'Amazon Autos,' a new service that allows users to purchase new Hyundai vehicles through the Amazon platform. The service offers transparent pricing, financing options, and trade-ins, and it is currently available in 48 U.S. cities. Amazon Autos will exclusively sell Hyundai vehicles for its first year, with plans to add more brands in 2026.

articles.title: These Travel-Friendly Puffs Are Here to Replace Your Favorite Dry Shampoo
articles.author: Brooke Knappenberger
articles.summary: Briogeo released a dry shampoo puff featuring precise application and hair-loving ingredients. Kitsch offers a budget-friendly tinted dry shampoo for quick touch-ups. Violette_FR launched a dry shampoo puff with tapioca and rice starches for refreshing and volumizing hair.

articles.title: Disney Plus will be getting HDR10 Plus support.
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Samsung and Amazon introduced a new standard in 2017, positioned as a competitor to Dolby Vision. The update regarding this standard was announced at CES.

articles.title: This mean bean machine is bound to upset coffee fans
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Mihatama is introducing Flavor Craft AI, an app-controlled system that blends coffee beans based on user-selected flavor preferences. The AI directs the machine to create a blend of different beans to match the requested flavor profile. The product is launching soon for around $400 and pre-sales will happen via Indiegogo.

articles.title: Samsung AI Laundry
articles.author: Nepali Times
articles.summary: Samsung introduced two new 12-kg washing machine models that utilize AI to optimize water and energy usage based on user habits. The dial-controlled model costs Rs114,990, while the LED-controlled version is priced at Rs120,990. Users can also operate the machines through a mobile app.

articles.title: Dell's new PC names are boring—and a smart move
articles.author: Katy Steinmetz
articles.summary: Dell is overhauling its computer naming schema, phasing out brands like Inspiron and XPS in favor of Dell, Dell Pro, and Dell Pro Max. This change is aimed at simplifying choices for customers and leveraging the familiarity of similar naming conventions used by companies like Apple. Company executives cited customer confusion and overload as reasons for the change.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: What we know about Nintendo Switch 2 release date, specs, leaks, price
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Nintendo is anticipated to release the Nintendo Switch 2, though its launch date remains unconfirmed. The Pokemon Company, a Nintendo subsidiary, has launched Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket, a virtual version of the collectible card game, which has generated significant revenue and downloads since its release on October 30.

articles.title: Amazon Fire Stick Apps: Your Gateway to Endless Entertainment in 2025
articles.author: Jeremy Laukkonen
articles.summary: Tubi offers a streaming service similar to Netflix, providing on-demand movies and television shows. Users can immediately start watching after downloading the app, without needing a subscription or account creation.

articles.title: Oppo unveils Reno13, 13 Pro with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset in India
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Oppo's Reno13 features an IP66/68/69 rating for water and dust resistance.

articles.title: Verizon named a Leader in first-ever 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Private Mobile Network Services
articles.author: Verizon Communications
articles.summary: Verizon has been recognized as a Leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for 4G and 5G Private Mobile Network Services. This recognition highlights Verizon's capabilities and offerings in private mobile network services, delivered as an end-to-end service that covers design, architecting, deployment and management.

articles.title: Kindle Colorsoft review: Amazon's e-reader finally has colour, but does it justify the price?
articles.author: Rebecca Astill
articles.summary: Amazon has released the Kindle Colorsoft, featuring a seven-inch color screen, wireless charging, and waterproof design. It connects to Amazon's Kindle Store for book downloads and offers up to eight weeks of battery life. Although more expensive than the standard Kindle Paperwhite, the Colorsoft is designed for visual books like comic books and graphic novels.

articles.title: Skip the Stain Removers. This Detergent Is All You Need.
articles.summary: Tide Free & Gentle effectively removes stubborn stains like foundation, tomato sauce, burger grease, and pet odors from clothing, upholstery, and rugs. Its formula contains surfactants and enzymes that target and break down common stains. While effective on grease, grass, and odors, Amodex Ink & Stain Remover is recommended for ink and blood.

articles.title: Draftss.com Launches 7-Day Free Trial to Showcase Unlimited Creative Service Offerings
articles.summary: Draftss.com has launched a 7-day free trial for its unlimited design and development services. The trial allows potential clients to experience the platform's capabilities, including graphic design, UI/UX design, web development, and motion graphics, with no upfront commitment.

articles.title: AI at CES: a look at the wild PCs, smart glasses, and body-scanning mirrors turning heads at the conference
articles.author: Mark Sullivan
articles.summary: Nvidia is launching Project Digits, a personal AI supercomputer, designed for AI researchers. Nuwa is releasing the Nuwa Pen, an ink pen that digitizes handwriting and integrates with productivity apps. Halliday is launching smart glasses with real-time translation and an AI assistant. Withings showcased Omnia, a body-scanning health mirror concept, highlighting their health-tracking capabilities.

articles.title: This 'As Seen on TV' scrubber 'makes cleaning a dreamy breeze' — now over 40% off
articles.author: Moriba Cummings
articles.summary: The Horsepower Rechargeable Scrubber, a cleaning product designed for multiple surfaces, is being offered at a discounted price on Amazon. The scrubber features five interchangeable brush heads and is cordless and waterproof. It has received positive reviews for its cleaning power and ease of use on surfaces like grout, sinks, tubs, and tiles.

articles.title: Rihanna's Natural Hair Shines in New Fenty Beauty Launch Campaign
articles.author: Aamina Inayat Khan
articles.summary: Fenty Beauty is launching a new setting spray called #YouMist, promising 12-hour wear, waterproof, sweat and transfer-resistance. The product is formulated without fragrance or alcohols and will be available globally on January 17th. It is designed to lock in makeup while moving with the user.

articles.title: LambdaTest Transforms Visual Testing with the Introduction of New Features in the SmartUI Visual AI Engine for Flawless Digital Experiences
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LambdaTest has enhanced its SmartUI Visual AI Engine with AI-driven capabilities to improve visual testing accuracy and reduce review time. New features such as Page Shift Detection and advanced text stabilization, powered by OCR, are introduced to minimize false positives and improve reliability. The enhanced SmartUI integrates with various test automation frameworks, allowing teams to streamline workflows.

articles.title: Best Caviar Shop Singapore - Nomad Caviar's Launches Premium Online Delivery SG
articles.summary: NOMAD Caviar in Singapore introduces free, guaranteed, next-day delivery for all orders placed before 4 PM, Monday through Saturday. The company also offers a bespoke selection of caviar like Kaluga Hybrid and Ossetra caviar along with stylish accessories available for purchase. Customers can stay informed about new products and exclusive promotions via Instagram and mailing list.

articles.title: I Tossed My Go-to Dry Shampoo for This Brand-New Dry Shampoo ‘Puff' — It's Already Selling Out
articles.author: Savannah Born
articles.summary: A dry shampoo powder puff, free of harmful chemicals like talc and benzene, has been introduced as a healthier alternative to aerosol-based dry shampoos. This powder contains ingredients like milled starches, biotin, and copper peptides, and is suitable for all hair types, providing a refreshing and mattifying effect.

articles.title: 8 mind-blowing gadgets at CES 2025 I need in my life
articles.author: Stan Schroeder
articles.summary: At CES 2025, Roborock introduced the Saros Z70, a robotic vacuum with a robotic arm, while Dreame showcased a similar prototype. Nvidia revealed the Nvidia Digits supercomputer and RTX 50-series graphics cards. Lenovo displayed the ThinkBook Plus Gen 6, a laptop with a rollable OLED display, and Segway presented the Xyber, an electric bike. LG showcased a 32-inch, 6K monitor with Thunderbolt 5 support and Honda displayed the next iteration of the Honda 0 Saloon and the Honda 0 SUV electric car prototypes.

articles.title: Hurry! This HD projector is an unreal $59 thanks to an Amazon Lightning Deal
articles.author: Chris McGraw
articles.summary: Hompow launched the Hompow Digital Projector, a compact and user-friendly device capable of projecting up to a 300-inch display. This projector is compatible with laptops, streaming devices like Roku and Apple TV, and gaming consoles, offering a versatile home entertainment solution.

articles.title: Microsoft lays out plan to bring Xbox to handhelds this year
articles.author: Saqib Shah
articles.summary: Microsoft plans to create an upgraded OS that combines Xbox and Windows. This upgraded OS aims to deliver a gaming experience comparable to an Xbox-branded handheld, potentially releasing sooner than expected.

articles.title: Best AI Marketing Tool (2025): Klaviyo Recognized as Top AI Marketing Software by Consumer365
articles.summary: Consumer365 recognizes Klaviyo as a top AI marketing software due to its comprehensive suite of tools. Klaviyo integrates AI-powered features with multichannel marketing capabilities, streamlining workflows for personalized customer experiences with unified platform and Customer Data Platform (CDP).

articles.title: Amazon launches Amazon Retail Ad Service to let companies show ads in search results, product pages, and other areas of their own websites, initially in the US (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Amazon launched Amazon Retail Ad Service in the USA. The service enables companies to display ads within Amazon's search results, product pages, and other areas of their own websites. This new service aims to provide brands with premium placement on Amazon's platform.

articles.title: Dutch Bros Introduces New Cereal Drinks
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Dutch Bros has launched two new cereal-inspired drinks: the Cinnamon Swirl, featuring cinnamon sugar cereal flavored milk, and the Marshmallow Dream, featuring marshmallow cereal flavored milk. Both drinks are available at all Dutch Bros locations and can be ordered in various forms, such as lattes and freezes, while supplies last, starting January 3, 2025.

articles.title: Best Casino Sign-Up Promotions for 2025: Top Deals to Look Out For
articles.author: TXK Today Contributor
articles.summary: Sweepstakes casinos are enhancing their offerings with welcome bonuses for new players. Zula Casino provides sign-up promotions like no-deposit packages, first-purchase bonuses, and spin-a-wheel promotions. Players can claim these bonuses by registering and verifying their accounts, potentially maximizing rewards by playing familiar or jackpot games.

articles.title: Bamboo Rose Unveils TotalPLM: The Industry's Most Comprehensive Retail Management Platform, Powered by AI and Creative Collaboration
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Bamboo Rose launched TotalPLM™, a product lifecycle management platform. This platform is designed as a comprehensive and innovative solution for the retail industry.

articles.title: Here's 16 Facts About The Tesla Cybertruck You Need to Know
articles.author: Jake Harris
articles.summary: Tesla's Cybertruck, first shown in 2019, aims to redefine electric vehicles. This electric pickup truck is designed to transform perceptions of trucks with its versatile and sustainable features.

articles.title: YouCopia® Breaks into Bathroom Storage and Organization
articles.author: You Copia
articles.summary: YouCopia, celebrating its 15th anniversary, is expanding beyond kitchen organization by introducing bathroom organization solutions. This marks a new product line for the company, known for its innovative and functional designs.

articles.title: Henkel's Smartwash™ Defines a New Era of Clean at CES® 2025
articles.author: Henkel
articles.summary: Henkel is launching Smartwash™ Technology, an AI-driven detergent dosing system for washing machines and dishwashers, under the Persil® and Somat® Smartwash brands. This launch is targeted at the European market starting in 2025. Henkel is also using CES 2025 to initiate partnership discussions with appliance manufacturers to create future machines.

articles.title: Harbor Freight opens New Kensington store, plans grand opening event
articles.author: Brian C Rittmeyer
articles.summary: Harbor Freight opened a new tools store in New Kensington. The new store is the company's fourth in Westmoreland County and its 67th in Pennsylvania. A grand opening event is planned for Jan. 25 where the first 150 customers will get a free bucket.

articles.title: Leading Cleaning Supplies Distributor Selects HawkSearch to Power Product Discovery
articles.summary: Bridgeline Digital, Inc. announced that HawkSearch has been chosen by a JanSan distributor to enhance their digital customer experience. HawkSearch will leverage dynamic auto-complete, personalized product recommendations, advanced promotional tools, and robust merchandising capabilities to improve search accuracy and drive revenue growth for the distributor. These tools aim to connect customers to the right products quickly and efficiently.

articles.title: Servants of the Dark: A New Metroidvania Adventure in the Gal Guardians Series
articles.summary: Gal Guardians introduced Servants of the Dark. Servants of the Dark is a gothic-inspired 2D action game.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland set to sell bargain €1 product for keeping food fresh in middle aisle this week
articles.author: Danielle Russell Masterson
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has launched a range of kitchen items, including air-tight containers, storage jars, and cooking gadgets, priced at €1 each. Additionally, the supermarket is offering discounted kitchen items like the Aluminium Shallow Casserole and Mini Chopper. Planning meals has become even easier with the Silvercrest 125W Vacuum Sealer just €19.99.

articles.title: CWENCH Hydration™ Gains Distribution in Metro Supermarkets Across Ontario
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands is launching its flagship product, CWENCH Hydration, in 47 Metro supermarkets across Ontario by the end of January 2025. This launch marks CWENCH Hydration's entry into the Canadian large-chain grocery market, complementing its existing retail presence in other major Canadian chains. The company aims to increase the visibility of the product by training resources and materials for Metro employees.

articles.title: Know the features, Specification and pricing detail here
articles.summary: POCO launched the POCO X7 series in India on January 9, 2025, consisting of the POCO X7 5G and POCO X7 Pro 5G models. The POCO X7 5G features a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra processor, while the POCO X7 Pro 5G includes a MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra. Both models are available for purchase on Flipkart and are designed to offer high-performance at competitive prices.

articles.title: 36 Brilliant Products You'll Be Glad You Finally Bought
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new products and services available for purchase, primarily on Amazon. These include items like wireless transmitters, cleaning tablets, pet care tools, kitchen gadgets, personal care items, and home organization solutions from companies like Wad-Free, Mouthwatchers, Nori, Click & Carry and Island Genius. The products aim to improve convenience, hygiene, and efficiency in various aspects of daily life.

articles.title: Pinkberry rings in 2025 with new frozen yogurt
articles.author: Brian
articles.summary: Pinkberry has launched a new limited-time flavor, Yuzu Meringue frozen yogurt, in participating stores nationwide. This flavor combines yuzu with meringue and can be paired with crumbled pie crust and fresh raspberries.

articles.title: Blue Yonder Transforms and Reimagines Supply Chain Planning With Latest Product Release
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Blue Yonder announced product updates to its AI-powered platform. The updates target cognitive planning and execution solutions. These changes aim to enhance agility and accelerate global expansion for organizations.

articles.title: Swiggy Instamart to get its own app, on track to surpass food delivery business
articles.author: The Week News Desk
articles.summary: Swiggy is launching a standalone app for its Instamart on-demand platform to augment its reach. This new app will provide the same benefits to premium subscription customers as the original app. Instamart boasts a range of nearly 50,000 products.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9 Pro XL prices are almost unmissable with new Carphone Warehouse deal
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Google is offering deals on its new Pixel 9 phones and the Pixel 9 Pro XL, which features a larger screen and improved battery life compared to the Pixel 9 Pro. Samsung is also offering free laptops and earbuds with new purchases.

articles.title: GenAI for Business Success: Practical AI Applications in Modern Business
articles.author: ISAAC KAPLAN
articles.summary: The article discusses the transformative potential of Generative AI (GenAI) and AI Agents across various business sectors. It highlights practical applications such as automating customer service interactions, streamlining operations, and assisting in finance-related tasks. The article suggests that companies which strategically integrate GenAI into their operations are likely to experience sustained growth.

articles.title: Porsche ditches manual for speed in new Carrera S revamp
articles.author: Aleksander Ruciński
articles.summary: Porsche is launching a new version of the Carrera S featuring an automatic 8-speed PDK transmission and a three-litre, six-cylinder boxer engine, enabling it to reach 97 km/h in 3.3 seconds. The new Carrera S includes features like Porsche Torque Vectoring Plus (PTV+) system and enhanced brakes, with optional upgrades such as adaptive PASM suspension.

articles.title: Fair & Handsome gets fair? Emami rebrands cream as 'Smart and Handsome'; Kartik Aryan new brand ambassador
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Emami Ltd has rebranded its men's cream 'Fair And Handsome' to 'Smart And Handsome', reflecting a shift towards comprehensive grooming solutions. With Kartik Aaryan as the new brand ambassador, Emami plans to launch an extensive campaign across television, digital, and social media platforms to support the rebranding.

articles.title: Empowering Young Skin: Y Play Z's Mission To Redefine Skincare
articles.author: Manish Saini
articles.summary: Y Play Z launched in November 2024, is introducing a new skincare brand tailored for kids and teens in India, offering safe and effective products designed for sensitive skin. The company plans to diversify its product range with targeted skincare solutions, including sunscreen and acne care products, while expanding its e-commerce presence and offline collaborations to reach tier 2 and 3 cities. The brand aims for 30-40% growth in the next year by focusing on innovation and inclusivity.

articles.title: Samsung S25 Series May Include AI Subscription Plan; Details
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch an "AI subscription" plan for Galaxy smartphones, potentially expanding its existing AI subscription club to its smartphone lineup. The company is also expected to launch its AI-powered smart robot, Bollie, as part of the subscription service, debuting in Korea and the US.

articles.title: ⚡Know Price, Specifications and Features of New OPPO Reno 13 Series Launched in India
articles.summary: OPPO launched the OPPO Reno 13 5G and OPPO Reno 13 Pro 5G in India. The new OPPO Reno 13 series 5G features AI capabilities.

articles.title: Aldi's new 'handy' dehumidifier helps dry clothes and prevents mould
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the AMBIANO Midi Dehumidifier, priced at £89.99, designed to improve air quality and reduce allergies, with features like a 24-hour timer and clothes drying mode. Alongside the dehumidifier, Aldi is also introducing a range of new household items including a Spray Mop (£9.99), Portable Vacuum Cleaner (£17.99), and Oil-Filled Radiator (£29.99).

articles.title: Its a sad day to be the 2024 BMW X1
articles.author: Boston Herald
articles.summary: BMW released a redesigned version of the X1 to the consumer market last year. The BMW X1 boasts power, fuel economy, comfort, and aesthetics appealing to modern consumers.

articles.title: Emami rebrands Fair and Handsome to Smart and Handsome to tap growing male grooming products market
articles.author: Suneera Tandon
articles.summary: Emami Ltd has rebranded its male grooming brand from Fair and Handsome to Smart and Handsome, with Kartik Aaryan as the new brand ambassador. This rebranding is part of a strategy to introduce new face, body, and hair care products and tap into a larger market beyond fairness creams. The Man Company, fully acquired by Emami, also offers a range of grooming products.

articles.title: CES 2025: A Sneak Peek At Some Of The Most Impressive Products From The Event
articles.summary: At CES 2025, Samsung and LG introduced AI-integrated TVs, while TCL launched its QM6K entry-level QLED TV. Lenovo unveiled a rollable laptop, Ugreen showcased its Nexode 500W charger, and Halliday presented smart glasses with an invisible display. Swippitt introduced a fast-charging phone accessory, and Utec launched the Ultraloq Bolt Mission smart lock with ultra-wideband technology.

articles.title: Rowntree's marks Jelly Tots 60th birthday with Tangy spin-off
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Rowntree's has launched Jelly Tots Tangy, a sour spin-off of Jelly Tots, to celebrate its 60th anniversary. The new product, made with real fruit juice, is vegan and available in 140g sharing bags and targets shoppers' growing interest in sour sweets.

articles.title: B&M 'has done it again' with £5 candles that look like £40 designer brand
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: B&M introduced the "Nomi" candle range, priced at £5, as an affordable alternative to the luxury Neom candles which cost £40. The retailer is also offering storage solutions starting from £3, which are endorsed by Stacey Solomon.

articles.title: Convenience store reopens in former abandoned Benton Township lot
articles.author: JULIANA KNOT HP Correspondent
articles.summary: GSJ Market opened a new convenience store in Benton Township, offering gas and snacks. The store is located at 1808 M-139. The permitting and construction process for the gas station and convenience store took three years.

articles.title: Out of Thousands of Beauty Products, These 5 Were Our Favorite Launches of 2024
articles.author: Mary Honkus
articles.summary: Several beauty products were highlighted in 2024, including the Aire 360, a three-in-one hair styling tool featuring blow dryer, round brush, and curling barrels. Rhode launched the Pocket Blush, available in six shades. Also featured was a jasmine-gardenia fragrance from a French-owned NYC fragrance house and a popular lip plumper.

articles.title: Ninja quietly announces its latest ice cream machine that makes soft serve – I want it now
articles.author: Bethan Girdler-Maslen
articles.summary: Ninja has announced the Ninja Swirl, a new soft-serve ice cream machine.  The Ninja Swirl, which is similar in design to the Ninja Creami, specializes in producing soft serve ice cream and can also make classic scooped desserts. Currently, details and launch date are limited, with more information available on the Ninja US website.

articles.title: CES 2025 unveils bizarre and innovative gadgets
articles.summary: At CES 2025, Lenovo introduced the ThinkBook Plus Gen 6 Rollable, featuring a rollable OLED display. Kirin Holdings unveiled an electronic spoon that enhances saltiness, while Spicer presented an AI-powered spice dispenser. Birdify showcased the Bath Pro, an AI birdbath. Additionally, Yukai Engineering launched Nékojita FuFu, a robotic cat to cool coffee, and Mirumi, a purse robot.

articles.title: Snowdrop essence: The secret to radiant and hydrated skin
articles.summary: Snowdrop moisture essence is introduced as a new beauty product known for its hydrating properties. Its natural glycerin and hyaluronic acid content can increase skin hydration levels by 50%, making it suitable for dry or dehydrated skin.

articles.title: Viral Video: Rahul Gandhi makes cold coffee at Keventers store, interacts with founders and staff
articles.author: Livemint
articles.summary: Keventers, a company with a legacy of almost 100 years, has recently launched Keventers Waffles. These waffles are available at over 170 exclusive retail brand shops throughout India, priced at ₹99, and come in six flavors including Classic Honey Butter, Lotus Biscoff, and Nutella.

articles.title: Buying groceries, online?
articles.author: Staff Reports
articles.summary: Several companies including Amazon (via Amazon Fresh and Whole Foods), Walmart (via Walmart+), Target, Costco (via InstaCart), InstaCart, DoorDash, UberEats, PostMates and Sam's Club offer grocery delivery services.  These services can be accessed through their respective apps or websites, providing options for both delivery and pickup.  Some offer subscription benefits like free subscriptions to other services to promote their adoption and usability.

articles.title: CES 2025 unveils bizarre and innovative gadgets
articles.summary: CES 2025 introduced innovative and unusual products, including laptops with rollable screens and robots for purses, showcasing new technologies from tech giants like Nvidia.

articles.title: Big As Toyota Fortuner, Offers Insane 23+ Kmpl Mileage At Half The Price: THIS 8-Seater Car Is Truly A Gem! Huge Sunroof, ADAS, 360-Degree Camera & More
articles.author: Lakshya Rana
articles.summary: Toyota Innova Hycross features a 10-inch infotainment system with Android Auto and Apple CarPlay. It also includes a 9-speaker JBL sound system, panoramic sunroof, second-row ottoman seats, and advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) such as adaptive cruise control and lane assist. Safety features include 6 airbags, VSC, TPMS, and a 360-degree camera.

articles.title: Swiggy Instamart expands to 75+ cities, to launch a parallel standalone app
articles.author: Sujata
articles.summary: Swiggy Instamart, Swiggy's quick commerce service, has expanded to 76 cities and will be available as a standalone application providing faster access. The Instamart app offers seamless adoption and access to 50,000 products with 10-minute deliveries, while also being available within the Swiggy unified application. All Swiggy One benefits will apply to both platforms.

articles.title: Aldi's new dehumidifier dries clothes, prevents mould and improves your home's air quality
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a new AMBIANO 200W dehumidifier with features like overflow protection, child-lock, adjustable fan speed, and wheels for mobility. The appliance, available in black or white, helps improve air quality, reduce allergies, and dry clothes and launches in stores on January 12. Aldi is also introducing a range of new laundry and household products including a Spray Mop, a Portable Vacuum Cleaner, and an Oil-Filled Radiator.

articles.title: Everything you need to know about Whataburger's NC plans — and what to eat
articles.author: Heidi Finley
articles.summary: Whataburger is preparing to launch multiple restaurants in North Carolina in 2025, offering a customizable menu including burgers, chicken, and breakfast items available 24 hours a day. The menu features a range of options like the Patty Melt, Spicy Chicken Sandwich, and Breakfast on a Bun Ranchero Bob, with select sauces and pancake mix available for purchase online and in some retail stores.

articles.title: "Rock a New Era": Roborock revolutionizes smart home cleaning at CES 2025 with robotic arm equipped Saros Z70
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Roborock is launching several new products. The Saros series features robotic vacuum cleaners like the Saros Z70 with an OmniGrip robotic arm, the Saros 10 with RetractSense navigation, and the Saros 10R with StarSight Autonomous System 2.0. Additionally, the F25 Series of wet-dry vacuum cleaners and the Zeo-cycle washer-dryers with Zeo-cycle drying technology are being introduced.

articles.title: Eight Futuristic And Ridiculous Gadgets From CES 2025
articles.author: @Bsa Grant89127
articles.summary: TCL introduced the 60 XE Nxtpaper smartphone, which quickly converts between a full-color screen and a monochrome e-ink display. Samsung showcased extra-thin displays that can be stretched, bent, and rolled. Additionally, several other companies presented innovative gadgets, like color-changing glasses and robotic companions.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer new 'warm and smart' duvet coat is a hit with shoppers
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has launched a new style of their popular 'duvet coats' collection. This practical coat features fleece-lined pockets, a hood, popper/zip fastenings and 'Stormwear' technology to keep the wearer dry in light showers. Customer reviews suggest the coat is warm, stylish, and of good quality.

articles.title: Swiggy to launch standalone app for quick commerce arm Instamart
articles.author: Livemint
articles.summary: Swiggy plans to launch a standalone app for Instamart, its rapid commerce division. This strategic move aims to expand Instamart's reach and cater to the growing demand for quick deliveries, potentially exceeding the scale of Swiggy's core food delivery service. Instamart will continue to be accessible within the main Swiggy app.

articles.title: Nescafé Espresso Concentrate expands to the US: enabling consumers to create customized, café-style, cold espresso beverages at home
articles.author: Pr Newswire
org: Nestlé Coffee Brands Strategic Business Unit
articles.summary: Nescafé is launching Nescafé Espresso Concentrate in the US, targeting younger generations. This concentrate, made with 100% Arabica beans, will be available in Black and Sweet Vanilla variations starting in February. It has been successfully launched last year in China and Australia.

articles.title: Samsung will launch paid subscription plan for Galaxy smartphones starting next month
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing the 'AI Subscription Club' for Galaxy smartphones and the recently launched Ballie AI robot starting next month, offering access to AI technology for a monthly fee. The new Samsung Galaxy S25 series will be launched on January 22, 2025 with upgrades to Samsung's Galaxy AI.

articles.title: Nescafé Espresso Concentrate expands to the US: enabling consumers to create customized, café-style, cold espresso beverages at home
org: Nestlé Coffee Brands Strategic Business Unit
articles.summary: Nescafé is launching its first-ever liquid espresso concentrate in the US, targeting younger generations who prefer cold coffee. The Nescafé Espresso Concentrate, already available in China and Australia, will be available in February in two variations: Black and Sweet Vanilla.

articles.title: ACE Hardware Rebrands to AZKO: New Store Concept and Expansion Plans
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: PT Aspiration Life Indonesia Tbk (ACES) has launched its first Azko store at Living World Alam Sutera Mall in Tangerang, marking a shift towards becoming 'Your Home Life Improvement Partner'. The Azko store features inspiration zones, a digital-first approach for online and in-store purchases, and a kids' playground. It offers over 50,000 items, including kitchen essentials, home decor, bicycles, and camping gear.

articles.title: Nescafé Espresso Concentrate expands to the US: enabling consumers to create customized, café-style, cold espresso bever
articles.author: Europa Press
org: Nestlé Coffee Brands Strategic Business Unit
articles.summary: Nescafé, a Nestlé brand, is launching Nescafé Espresso Concentrate in the US to address the growing demand for at-home cold coffee. The concentrate, made with 100% Arabica beans, will be available in Black and Sweet Vanilla variations starting in February. This product has been previously launched in China and Australia.

articles.title: Nescafé Espresso Concentrate expands to the US: enabling consumers to create customized, café-style, cold espresso beverages at home
articles.author: Nestlé
org: Nestlé Coffee Brands Strategic Business Unit
articles.summary: Nescafé, a Nestlé brand, is launching its first liquid espresso concentrate in the US to cater to the growing demand for at-home cold coffee, particularly among younger generations. The concentrate, made with 100% Arabica beans, will be available in Black and Sweet Vanilla variations starting in February, allowing consumers to create barista-style beverages easily.

articles.title: Thai Nguyen pioneers e-commerce with global export ambitions
articles.author: Bạch Dương
articles.summary: Thai Nguyen launched its provincial product store on Shopee on January 7, enabling local businesses to sell products online. By 2025, Thai Nguyen aims to export local products internationally through e-commerce platforms, starting with the ASEAN market.

articles.title: Swiggy launches 10-minute ‘Snacc' delivery app
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Swiggy launched a new app called 'Snacc' that delivers beverages, snacks, tiffin items, and meals in 10 to 15 minutes. The Snacc app is available on the Google Play store and offers a variety of options, including coffee, tiffin items, pasta bowls, and Indian breakfast dishes. Users can enjoy a complimentary chocolate cookie and free delivery on their first order with a minimum value of ₹149.

articles.title: ZāZEN Properties' The Hub Residences reports 100% sales in its first week of launch
articles.author: Arabian Business
articles.summary: The company launched its new product, Townhouse apartments, in Al Furjan. 95% of the apartments were sold on the first day, setting a new benchmark.

articles.title: Research, personalisation and automation: What AI can do for publishers
articles.author: Paul Hood
articles.summary: Must Have Ideas launched the world's first AI-powered TV shopping channel on Sky called Spark in September 2024. This proprietary software system automates programming by stitching together pre-recorded clips and analyzing data to optimize the schedule. This innovation enabled the company to thrive in a competitive space.

articles.title: Cleaning fans clear shelves of £3.25 spray being hailed as ‘UK equivalent' to US' beloved Dawn before they run out
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Fairy has launched its 'Skip the Soak' Power Spray in the UK, positioned as an equivalent to Dawn spray. The product aims to ease washing dishes with tough grease without water and is available at Tesco and Waitrose. It is designed for pre-treating dishes before dishwashing or handwashing and can also be used as a multi-purpose kitchen cleaner.

articles.title: Cleaning fans clear shelves of £3.25 spray being hailed as ‘UK equivalent' to US' beloved Dawn before they run out
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Fairy spray is being introduced in the UK as the equivalent of Dawn dish spray. It's available in Tesco and Waitrose for £3.25 and is being hailed for its degreasing and multi-purpose cleaning abilities. The product has already gained popularity on social media.

articles.title: Elevate Your Online Presence with Emerge Digital (DigitalEmerge LLP)
articles.summary: Emerge Digital specializes in offering services in eCommerce development, website and application development, UI/UX design, and branding. They aim to transform brands into digital powerhouses by offering tailored services.

articles.title: Luna Ring Gen 2.0 from Noise is here
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Noise has announced pre-booking for its Luna Ring Gen 2.0, an AI-powered smart ring made from fighter jet-grade titanium, starting January 9, with deliveries expected by March 2025. The ring monitors various biomarkers and provides AI-driven workout and nutritional advice with up to 30 days of battery life. Additionally, Noise introduced the ColorFit Pro 6 series smartwatch.

articles.title: LG CNS to drive AI transformation for clients
articles.author: Lee Min-hyung
articles.summary: LG CNS is focusing on AI and cloud services as part of its growth strategy, with combined sales accounting for 51.6 percent of the firm's total in 2023. The company plans to expand globally after its IPO, aiming to become a first mover in digital transformation using its own AI center which was opened in January 2024.

articles.title: LG presents Vision for Expanding its 'AI Home Solutions' into mobility spaces
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching the 'Lifestyle Solution for Mobility' concept vehicle featuring the LG Mobility Experience (MX) platform at CES 2025. The MX platform integrates LG's smart life solutions to create a seamless connection between mobility and the AI Home. LG plans to offer the MX platform as a subscription service, making it accessible to a broader audience.

articles.title: The Brand Auditors Launches AI-Powered Brand and Digital Marketing Audits to Drive Business Growth
articles.summary: The Brand Auditors has launched improved brand audit services designed for mid-sized and large companies. These AI-enhanced audits offer deeper insights into brand positioning and competitive dynamics, providing data-driven recommendations for optimizing marketing strategies and driving business growth with two levels of customization.

articles.title: Cordial Launches Cordial Edge
articles.summary: Cordial launched Cordial Edge, a multimodal AI technology for retail marketing teams, which generates brand-specific models and uses multiple data types simultaneously. Cordial Edge offers features like expansive product recommendations, experiential clienteling, revenue-based scheduling, data-driven creative, and location-based promotions to enhance marketing performance. The AI models integrate structured and unstructured data, generating models rapidly and updating scores daily.

articles.title: 6 News at 11 p.m. for 1/8/2025
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing a new menu to help customers warm up this winter.

articles.title: Best Mattress Protectors for Bensons Beds
articles.author: Nick Mwangi
articles.summary: Bensons Beds offers various mattress protectors, including Premium Waterproof, Hypoallergenic, Cooling, and Quilted options. These protectors aim to extend mattress life by shielding against spills, allergens, and dust mites. Each protector offers specific benefits such as waterproofing, allergen resistance, cooling technology, or added comfort, tailored to different customer needs and preferences.

articles.title: iGarden Debuts TurboX Series Robotic Pool Cleaner and Robotic Lawn Mower
articles.author: i Garden
articles.summary: iGarden launched the iGarden TurboX Series Robotic Pool Cleaner. iGarden also launched the iGarden Lawn Mower.

articles.title: Are These Shoes Hideous or Genius?
articles.author: Jacob Gallagher
articles.summary: New Balance introduced the 1906L, a hybrid sneaker and loafer design dubbed 'Snoafer' by the internet, in the previous year. This new shoe model is designed to bridge the gap between informal and formal footwear.

articles.title: Robotic pool cleaner with jaw-dropping 15-hour battery life revealed at CES 2025
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: iGarden Tech company introduced the TurboX and TurboX Master robotic pool cleaners.

articles.title: Samsung S25 series may come with AI subscription plan, but there's a catch
articles.summary: Samsung is rumored to introduce an 'AI subscription' plan for Galaxy smartphones. This may be an expansion of the 'AI subscription club,' which currently offers smarter versions of home appliances for a monthly fee in Korea and the US. In February 2025, Samsung also plans to launch 'Bollie,' an AI-powered smart robot.

articles.title: BYD's electric hypercar can jump on its own – but why?
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: BYD has released a marketing video showcasing the Yangwang U9 electric hypercar and its advanced DiSus-X body control system, which allows the car to jump over obstacles and perform other maneuvers. The U9 features a quad-motor, 960kW setup and achieves 0-100km/h in 2.36 seconds.

articles.title: BYD's electric hypercar can jump on its own – but why?
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: BYD released a marketing video. The video showcases technological features of BYD's new hypercar.

articles.title: 6 News at 6:00 p.m. for 1/8/2025
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced a new menu for the winter season.

articles.title: 33 Things To Check Out If You Want To Avoid Responsibility But Still Want The Results Of Being Productive
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article highlights several new products and tools. For automated cleaning, there's the Roborock robotic vacuum and the EyeVac stationary vacuum. For smart home integration, the SwitchBot Smart Switch Button Pusher turns regular devices into smart ones. The article also introduces various cleaning solutions such as rust-removing gel spray and Affresh dishwasher cleaner.

articles.title: These 35 Problem-Solving Products Are Downright Perfect
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: The article highlights various products available for purchase on Amazon, including cleaning paste by The Pink Stuff, wool dryer balls by Handy Laundry, and reparative lip treatment by O'Keeffe's. It also features a humidifier tank cleaner, a makeup-correcting stick, and Bottle Bright cleaning tablets, among others, showcasing a diverse range of items for different needs.

articles.title: BAT Rothmans broadens reach of Vuse in vaping market
articles.author: Ko Dong-hwan
articles.summary: BAT Rothmans is expanding the distribution of its VUSE Go Slim 2ml vaping product to include the entire city of Seoul, as well as Incheon and Busan. The VUSE Go Slim 2ml features a slim design, ergonomic mouthpiece, ceramic heating technology, and six new flavors. It also includes a boost control button and a removable battery for practicality.

articles.title: YEEDI S14 PLUS Wins Indoor Cleaning Technology Innovation Gold Award: Redefining Home Cleaning with Excellence in Innovation
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: YEEDI's S14 PLUS received the Indoor Cleaning Technology Innovation Gold Award at CES 2025, recognizing its advancements in robotic vacuum technology. YEEDI launched pioneering products throughout 2024 which revolutionized robotic cleaning capabilities, addressing consumer needs for efficient and simplified home cleaning. These innovations position YEEDI as a leader in smart home technology.

articles.title: Sri Lanka launches national initiative to boost R&D commercialization
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Sri Lanka has launched a national initiative, including the website nirdc.gov.lk, to commercialize research and development. This initiative aims to promote innovation, support value-added goods and services production, and enhance Sri Lanka's global market position through a strong new product development strategy. The government is committed to investing in research and development to drive innovation and economic progress.

articles.title: Harvest Market: Dark Chocolate-Chia Pot De Creme Recipe
articles.author: Jaclyn Friedlander
articles.summary: Starbucks introduces a new menu to help customers warm up during the winter season.

articles.title: YEEDI S14 PLUS Wins Indoor Cleaning Technology Innovation Gold Award: Redefining Home Cleaning with Excellence in Innovation
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: YEEDI's S14 PLUS won the Indoor Cleaning Technology Innovation Gold Award. YEEDI also launched the M12 PRO+ with 11,000 Pa suction and ZeroTangle technology, and the C12 COMBO, an all-in-one whole-house cleaning solution. The YEEDI S14 PLUS will be available starting in March.

articles.title: Homebot Ireland Glider review: A home cleaner that (mostly) takes care of itself
articles.author: Ciara O'Brien
articles.summary: Homebot Ireland introduces the Glider, a robot vacuum and mop combo priced at €800. The Glider features a base station for automated dust bin emptying, mop pad cleaning, and water tank refilling and uses the Smartlife app for alerts and control. It adapts to different floor types and has a decent navigation system.

articles.title: FranConnect Unveils a Suite of AI Agents, Empowering Franchises and Multi-Location Businesses with Generative AI Bots that Automate Critical Business Outcomes
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: FranConnect has launched Frannie AI™, a suite of AI-powered agents integrated into its platform. These agents utilize generative large language models to enhance sales, operations, and marketing solutions for franchise and multi-location businesses.

articles.title: Batteries Plus's Strategic Partnerships Drive Nearly 130% Sales Increase
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Batteries Plus's franchisee partnerships are fueling record-breaking sales growth through elevated customer experience and expanded service offerings. A New Jersey franchisee store has emerged as a top repair destination, providing services from phone repairs to car batteries and key fobs.

articles.title: Technogym Connected Dumbbells review: Sleek AI fitness for your home at a price
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Technogym introduced Connected Dumbbells. The Connected Dumbbells incorporate AI.

articles.title: Bubble's Latest Launch Proves The Skincare Brand Isn't Just For Gen Z
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Bubble has launched its new Bubble Star Dew Hydrating Eye Cream. The product is a moisturizing eye cream designed for all ages.

articles.title: NEW GOLD DELIVERS HIGHEST PRODUCTION QUARTER OF 2024
articles.author: Canada Newswire
articles.summary: New Gold Inc. reports fourth quarter and full year operational results, achieving its highest production quarter of the year. New Gold has reached commercial production at New Afton's C-Zone and produced its first ore from Rainy River underground.

articles.title: EGORAS launches initiative to connect businesses with over 100,000 customers
articles.author: Business Day Online
articles.summary: EGORAS, a Nigerian startup, has launched Egomart, a new online marketplace. Egomart aims to connect businesses with over 100,000 paying customers.

articles.title: Prostavive Reviews 2025: Here's Our Unbiased Review After!(We Tried It)
articles.summary: Prostavive is a product undergoing review in 2025. Reviewers have tested Prostavive.
